    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    ValueWithAttributes CompanyName

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:String
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:CompanyName

      • Description

        Identifies a company by name.
        Additional Documentation 
        Type Value
        Implementers Assigned XSD Type: {http://chameleon.anonymous/ns}StringLength0to128

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<CompanyName code="AI" codeContext="Example String Value" department="Adventure department" description="Example String Value" division="Travel Division" shortName="Adventure Inc" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">Travel Adventure Partners Incorporated</CompanyName>

      Example JSON

      {
  "CompanyName" : {
    "value" : "Travel Adventure Partners Incorporated",
    "division" : "Travel Division",
    "department" : "Adventure department",
    "shortName" : "Adventure Inc",
    "code" : "AI",
    "codeContext" : "Example String Value",
    "description" : "Example String Value"
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        division
        The division name or ID with which the contact is associated.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Travel Division
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        department
        The department name or ID with which the contact is associated.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Adventure department
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        shortName
        Used to provide the company common name.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Adventure Inc
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        code
        Identifies a company by the company code.
        Details
        Type Code
        Example Value AI
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
